channel.title: Player Killing Rank System Help
channel.description:
im using RapidRocket7's tutorial on how to add ^^ the title. Which can be found here - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,456985.0.html
Im up to this part.
[code]client killa = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];[/code] Below: [code]public boolean ApplyDead() {[/code]
Im using Exion Source,
I cant find public boolean ApplyDead() { in client.java
and so far im getting this error while compiling what im up to so far.
[code]src\server\model\players\Client.java:307: cannot find symbol symbol : method addItem(int,int) location: class server.model.players.Client addItem(1048, 1); // Gives you a PHat, feel free to chan ge this and ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
if anyone could help me i'd be really thankfull. also ill have teamviewer open for the time being if you think you can help me set it up. [sup]My id is 248 199 710 pass is 4712[/sup]

item.title: Player Killing Rank System Help
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

shadytheone:

remove the // comment.

You have no clue what your talking about ^^

At Original Poster: You have too call the addItem method from whatever class it’s in, because it’s not located in that class.

Try changing your code too:

c.addItem(1048, 1); // Gives you a PHat, feel free to chan

Read full topic
